post.text:
Crooked launched her political career by letting terrorists off the hook. We must #DrainTheSwamp!

comment.author: Hannah
comment.text: Trump supporting deplorable kills two cops in Iowa. Apparent he threatened to kill more cops but he couldn't cause the system was rigged against him.

replies.author: Hannah
replies.text: I would be upset about my comment too, if I shared the same beliefs as the Trump supporting Iowa cop killer.
